padu labana siyaluma langama pradeshikawala bas dhawanaya pilibandawa samikshanayak kirime wada piliwelak shri langama arambaa thibe.me yatath wana prathama samikshanaya me dinawala kaluthara pradeshikaye arambaa athi athara ,ema radeshikayata ayath aluthgama, panadura, kaluthara,horana ha mathugama yana dipo 5 parikakshawata lak kere.prawahana amathi thumara welgama mahathage upades paridi langama sabhapathi shashi welgama mahathage meheya wimen mema samikshanaya sidu karana athara, pradhana karyalaye ha pradeshikaye niladharin sama bas rathayakama ekkena bagin gamanan karanu labe.mema samikshanaya aarambha kirimen pasu ema dipowala dainika aadayama ihala gos athi bawa sabhapathiwaraya pawasiya.senasurada , irida dina yan athuluwa sathiye dina 7ma me samikshanaya karana bawath, samikshanaya karana ha nokarana dinayan me anuwa sasanda baliya haki bawath sabhapathiwaraya sandahan kaleyalangama dainika aadayamen siyayata 15 k pamana nolabi yama nisa mema piyawaragena athi athara , basriye praweshapath nithuth thirima, magin sankhyawa athulu karunu rasak kerehi mehidi awadhanaya yomu kere..
namuth aparadha nithignya kara ema watina danuma ha athdakim kshethraye nithi widyawa.
wasara thunakata warak siyaluma sangunata siwuru pidiya.
